marketplaces.name: cobi-claude-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Curated Claude Code plugin marketplace - featuring verified, production-ready plugins from trusted sources

plugins.name: superpowers
plugins.description: Core skills library for Claude Code: TDD, debugging, collaboration patterns, and proven techniques

plugins.name: claude-opus-4-5-migration
plugins.description: Migrate your code and prompts from Sonnet 4.x and Opus 4.1 to Opus 4.5

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Automated code review for pull requests using multiple specialized agents with confidence-based scoring

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Streamline your git workflow with simple commands for committing, pushing, and creating pull requests

plugins.name: explanatory-output-style
plugins.description: Adds educational insights about implementation choices and codebase patterns (mimics the deprecated Explanatory output style)

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive feature development workflow with specialized agents for codebase exploration, architecture design, and quality review

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Frontend design skill for UI/UX implementation

plugins.name: hookify
plugins.description: Easily create hooks to prevent unwanted behaviors by analyzing conversation patterns

plugins.name: learning-output-style
plugins.description: Interactive learning mode that requests meaningful code contributions at decision points (mimics the unshipped Learning output style)

plugins.name: plugin-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for developing Claude Code plugins with 7 specialized skills and guided workflow

plugins.name: pr-review-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents specializing in comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, and code simplification

plugins.name: ralph-wiggum
plugins.description: Continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development

plugins.name: security-guidance
plugins.description: Warn about potential security issues when editing files - targets command injection, XSS vulnerabilities, and dangerous coding patterns
